title: blackletter similar to, or used as the basis for, this "hb" logo
content:
I'm pretty sure this is not actually a font but artwork, but I'm looking for suggestions for something with a similar look, or similar feel. If this was derived from a typeface though, I'd appreciate knowing what it is. I know I've seen "adorned" blackletters like these in the past, but I can't track them down now.

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417060321im_/http:/1.bp.blogspot.com/_uaSIp_1tsPY/TT0fbXswlFI/AAAAAAAAMjc/QKMGL2U3wcc/s1600/HB%252B-%252BPiikki%252BLihassa%252B%252B%25282008%2529%252B-%252BFINL%2525C3%252582NDIA.jpg)

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417060321im_/http:/2.bp.blogspot.com/_1DNECwbxTHA/TUBmq2v4ljI/AAAAAAAAB88/FqpSWA72Z04/s1600/folder.jpg)
author: ChristTrekker

comments.content: Not especially similar, but a decorated blackletter: [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/facetype/aeronaut/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417060321/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/facetype/aeronaut/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/facetype/aeronaut/")
